Nabila, Faizal nyata unggul
04 Nov 2019, 05:30 by Oleh Syanty Octavia Amry
ANUGERAH Skrin 2019 (ASK2019) menutup tirainya Jumaat lalu dengan kemenangan besar berpihak pada drama Di Sisi karya arahan Wan Afzam Wan Daud sebagai Drama Terbaik.
Drama terbitan Unit Drama TV, RTM itu turut memenangi empat kategori lain iaitu Pengarah Terbaik Drama, Pelakon Pembantu Lelaki Terbaik Drama (Ruzaidi Rahman), Lakon TV Terbaik (Amin Masyur) dan Penyunting Drama Terbaik (Izar Masuri).
Bagaikan menghimpun bakat profesional dan serba boleh, kemenangan pelakon dan penggiat seni pada malam berkenaan seperti mencapai sasaran penonton.
Bersesuaian dengan watak masing-masing atas kemenangan yang diterima, Nabila Huda juga terkejut apabila dinobatkan Pelakon Wanita Terbaik Drama menerusi drama Dia Tidak Berdosa.
Mengakui naskhah berat itu begitu sebati dengan jiwanya, walaupun pada awal kelu apabila diumumkan sebagai pemenang, Nabila bersyukur dan gembira atas penghargaan yang diterima.


KUALA LUMPUR 01 NOVEMBER 2019. Pemenang Pelakon Wanita Terbaik Filem, Diana Dianelle pada malam Anugerah Skrin 2019 di Pusat Dagangan Dunia Putra (PWTC). NSTP/NURUL SYAZANA ROSE RAZMAN

“Ini antara anugerah yang saya nanti-nantikan kerana bakat kami sebagai pelakon dinilai juri profesional bukannya menerusi undian peminat.
“Rasa terharu dan sangat gembira atas anugerah diterima dan ini anugerah ketiga saya terima pada Anugerah Skrin,” katanya.
Bercakap mengenai wataknya dalam Dia Tidak Berdosa, Nabila mengakui, sejak dulu dia memang gemarkan watak berat seperti itu.
“Tidak tahu mengapa lebih selesa membawakan watak berat malah saya berasa peranan sebegitu sudah sebati dengan jiwa sehingga sukar menjayakan watak ringan atau komedi,” katanya.
Sementara itu, Faizal Hussein memenangi kategori Pelakon Lelaki Terbaik Drama menerusi drama Samad Tedung.
Faizal berkata, kemenangan itu diharap dapat membuka mata ramai penerbit tempatan dengan memberi bayaran setimpal terhadap lakonan yang diberikan.



“Saya anggap kemenangan ini peluang yang diberikan Allah SWT untuk bekerja lebih keras.
“Memang sudah lama tunggu anugerah seperti ini, walaupun sebelum ini pernah tercalon dan ramai menjangkakan saya akan menang, akhirnya tidak, tapi saya tak pernah berputus asa.
“Malah kemenangan diterima kali ini bukan alasan untuk saya ‘demand’ bayaran sebaliknya setiap harga yang diberikan rasanya setimpal dengan lakonan dipersembahkan,” katanya.
Malam anugerah yang berlangsung di Pusat Dagangan Dunia Putra (PWTC), Kuala Lumpur itu juga dimeriahkan dengan persembahan artis seperti Datuk Jamal Abdillah, Sissy Imann, Syamel, Ernie Zakri, Hael Husaini, Dayang Nurfaizah, Ayda Jebat dan Santesh.
Turut dihiburkan persembahan daripada The MADgicians, 2Twenty2 Squad, Ebby Yus, Issey, Zizi Kirana, Andi Bernadee, Psycusix dan 10 protege Mentor Milenia 2019.
Mengekalkan konsep tiada pengacara utama, ASK2019 diserikan dengan penampilan pasangan selebriti Zizan Razak, Nabila Huda, Rozita Che Wan, Zain Saidin, Siti Sarah, Shuib, Shaheizy Sam, Syatila Melvin, Eira Syazira, Azad Jasmin, Elly Mazlein dan Shuk Sahar.

If so, the real Faizal wins
04 Nov 2019, 05:30 by Syanty Octavia Amry
AWARDS Screen 2019 (ASK2019) closes its doors Friday with a huge victory in the drama Side of Wan Afzam Wan Daud's Best Drama.
The Drama Unit of the TV Drama Unit, RTM also won four other categories: Best Director of Drama, Best Drama Male Actor (Ruzaidi Rahman), Best TV Actor (Amin Masyur) and Best Drama Editor (Izar Masuri).
As if bringing together a professional and versatile talent, the award-winning cast and actress of the night seemed to reach the target.
In line with their respective roles in the victory, Nabila Huda was also surprised when she was nominated for Best Actress in the drama She's Sinless.
Admitting that heavyweight was so heartfelt, even early on when it was announced as the winner, Nabila was grateful and pleased with the award.


KUALA LUMPUR, NOVEMBER 01, 2019. Best Actress of the Film, Diana Dianelle on the eve of the 2019 Screen Awards at the Men's World Trade Center (PWTC). NSTP / NURUL SYAZANA ROSE RAZMAN

“This is one of the awards that I look forward to because our talents as a cast are judged by professional judges rather than by fan votes.
"I am thrilled and very pleased with the award received and this is my third award at the Screen Award," he said.
Talking about his character in He Is Not Sinful, Nabila admits that he has always loved such a heavy character.
"I don't know why it is so much fun to carry a heavy character and I feel that the role of the soul is so difficult that it is difficult to achieve a light or comedy character," he said.
Meanwhile, Faizal Hussein won the Best Actor Drama category through the drama Samad Tedung.
Faizal said the win was expected to open the eyes of many local publishers by paying a fair price for the performances.



“I consider this victory an opportunity given by Allah Almighty to work harder.
"It's been a long time since I had been offered an award like this, even though I had been nominated and many expected me to win, but no, but I never gave up.
"Even winning this time is not a reason for me to 'demand' a payment instead of every given price that feels like a fair amount of acting," he said.
The awards night held at the Putra World Trade Center (PWTC) in Kuala Lumpur was also celebrated by artists such as Datuk Jamal Abdillah, Sissy Imann, Syamel, Ernie Zakri, Hael Husaini, Dayang Nurfaizah, Ayda Jebat and Santesh.
Also performed by The MADgicians, 2Twenty2 Squad, Ebby Yus, Issey, Zizi Kirana, Andi Bernadee, Psycusix and 10 proteges of Mentor Milenia 2019.
Keeping the concept of no-one in the lead, ASK2019 is teeming with the likes of celebrity couples Zizan Razak, Nabila Huda, Rozita Che Wan, Zain Saidin, Siti Sarah, Shuib, Shaheizy Sam, Syatila Melvin, Eira Syazira, Azad Jasmin, Elly Mazlein and Shuk Sahar.
